message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $1600000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're getting close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product for $1550000. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1475000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product for $1525000. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1450000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product for $1495000. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1425000. Would you be willing to consider that?
